mutants.code:
def min_boxes_required(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        initial_amounts = case['initial_amounts']
        capacities = case['capacities']
        total_amt = sum(initial_amounts)
        sorted_capacities = sorted(capacities, reverse=True)
        boxes_needed = 1
        for capacity in sorted_capacities:
            total_amt -= capacity
            boxes_needed += 1
            if total_amt <= 0:
                break
        results.append(boxes_needed)
    return results

    return results
